BulletPoints: Managed 12 web applications and provided improvements and bug fixes as needed.
Redesigned integration of financial pipeline to Netsuite and updated documentation on process.
Worked and debugged Azure Service Bus and NServiceBus to provide messaging between systems.
Leveraged the Power Platform to help reduce complex low level code integrations.
Led a team in maintaining and improving 2 large eCommerce web applications.
Oversaw a successful transition when losing 20+ developers including the team's lead engineer.
Updated and performed production code turnovers through AWS and Github.
Improved redundancy in our production environment with Azure Indexes.
Maintained backend .Net MVC code while working in tandem with the frontend team on React and Vue changes.
Built custom Azure Functions that integrate a live chat system  and custom company applications to receive up-to-date product information.
Developed and updated ServiceNow logic workflows with custom Powershell scripts and REST API calls based on rapidly changing industry demands.
Designed API’s in our web application to interface with other company software.
Served as System Administrator for 20+ clients with remote and onsite support.
Implemented and serviced full scale IT support for business class PC’s, networks, servers, and miscellaneous hardware and software.
Created, maintained, and supported 20+ wordpress websites.
Handled security, backups, and malware prevention systems.
Added a QR reading feature to an android LiftTruck tracking application.
Wrote a VBA/Excel based sports field calculation software that rendered an accurately scaled layout of the field that the sales team would show potential customers.
Developed numerous code fixes and features in our EMR software for both the windows application, and web based portal using Winforms and WPF.
